021import net.tnemc.core.TNECore;
022import net.tnemc.core.account.Account;
023import net.tnemc.core.account.PlayerAccount;
024import net.tnemc.core.config.MainConfig;
025import net.tnemc.core.manager.TransactionManager;
026import net.tnemc.core.transaction.Receipt;
027import net.tnemc.core.transaction.history.AwayHistory;
028import net.tnemc.core.transaction.history.SortedHistory;
029import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.CmdSource;
030import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.message.MessageData;
031
032import java.util.Map;
033import java.util.Optional;
034import java.util.UUID;
035
036/**
037 * TransactionCommand
038 *
039 * @author creatorfromhell
040 * @since 0.1.2.0
041 */
042public class TransactionCommand {
043
044  //[page #]
045  public static void away(final CmdSource<?> sender, final int page) {
046
047    final Optional<Account> account = BaseCommand.account(sender, "away");
048
049    if(sender.player().isPresent() && MainConfig.yaml().getBoolean("Core.Commands.GUIAlternatives", true)) {
050      sender.player().get().inventory().openMenu(sender.player().get(), "transaction_away");
051      return;
052    }
053
054    if(account.isEmpty()) {
055      sender.message(new MessageData("Messages.Transaction.AwayNone"));
056      return;
057    }
058
059    final Optional<AwayHistory> away = account.get().away(((PlayerAccount)account.get()).getUUID());
060    if(away.isEmpty()) {
061      sender.message(new MessageData("Messages.Transaction.AwayNone"));
062      return;
063    }
064
065    final MessageData heading = new MessageData("Messages.Transaction.Away");
066    heading.addReplacement("$page", String.valueOf(page));
067    heading.addReplacement("$page_top", String.valueOf(away.get().maxPages()));
068    sender.message(heading);
069
070    for(final Map.Entry<Long, UUID> entry : away.get().getPage(page).entrySet()) {
071
072      final Optional<Receipt> receipt = account.get().findReceipt(entry.getValue());
073      if(receipt.isPresent()) {
074
075        final MessageData awayEntry = new MessageData("Messages.Transaction.AwayEntry");
076        awayEntry.addReplacement("$id", entry.getValue().toString());
077        awayEntry.addReplacement("$type", receipt.get().getType());
078        sender.message(awayEntry);
079      }
080    }
081  }
082
083  //[page:#] [world:name/all] [player:name]
084  public static void history(final CmdSource<?> sender, final int page, String region, final Account account) {
085
086    if(sender.player().isPresent() && MainConfig.yaml().getBoolean("Core.Commands.GUIAlternatives", true)) {
087      //sender.player().get().inventory().openMenu(sender.player().get(), "transaction_menu");
088      //return;
089    }
090
091    region = TNECore.eco().region().resolve(region);
092
093    final SortedHistory sorted = account.getSorted(account.getIdentifier());
094
095    if(sorted == null || sorted.getReceipts().isEmpty()) {
096      sender.message(new MessageData("Messages.Transaction.HistoryNone"));
097      return;
098    }
099
100    final MessageData heading = new MessageData("Messages.Transaction.History");
101    heading.addReplacement("$page", String.valueOf(page));
102    heading.addReplacement("$page_top", String.valueOf(sorted.maxPages()));
103    sender.message(heading);
104
105    for(final Map.Entry<Long, UUID> entry : sorted.getPage(page).entrySet()) {
106
107      final Optional<Receipt> receipt = account.findReceipt(entry.getValue());
108      if(receipt.isPresent()) {
109
110        String from = "None";
111        if(receipt.get().getFrom() != null) {
112          final Optional<Account> fromACC = receipt.get().getFrom().asAccount();
113          if(fromACC.isPresent()) {
114            from = fromACC.get().getName();
115          }
116        }
117
118        String to = "None";
119        if(receipt.get().getTo() != null) {
120          final Optional<Account> toACC = receipt.get().getTo().asAccount();
121          if(toACC.isPresent()) {
122            to = toACC.get().getName();
123          }
124        }
125
126        final MessageData awayEntry = new MessageData("Messages.Transaction.HistoryEntry");
127        awayEntry.addReplacement("$id", entry.getValue().toString());
128        awayEntry.addReplacement("$type", receipt.get().getType());
129        awayEntry.addReplacement("$initiator", from);
130        awayEntry.addReplacement("$recipient", to);
131        sender.message(awayEntry);
132      }
133    }
134  }
135
136  //<uuid>
137  public static void info(final CmdSource<?> sender, final UUID uuid) {
138
139    final Optional<Receipt> receipt = TransactionManager.receipts().getReceiptByUUID(uuid);
140
141    if(receipt.isEmpty()) {
142      final MessageData message = new MessageData("Messages.Transaction.Invalid");
143      message.addReplacement("$transaction", uuid.toString());
144      sender.message(message);
145      return;
146    }
147
148    final MessageData message = new MessageData("Messages.Transaction.Info");
149    message.addReplacement("$id", uuid.toString());
150    message.addReplacement("$type", receipt.get().getType());
151    sender.message(message);
152  }
153
154  //<uuid>
155  public static void voidT(final CmdSource<?> sender, final Account account, final UUID uuid) {
156
157    final Optional<Receipt> receipt = account.findReceipt(uuid);
158
159    if(receipt.isEmpty()) {
160      final MessageData message = new MessageData("Messages.Transaction.Invalid");
161      message.addReplacement("$transaction", uuid.toString());
162      sender.message(message);
163      return;
164    }
165
166    if(receipt.get().isVoided()) {
167      final MessageData message = new MessageData("Messages.Transaction.Already");
168      message.addReplacement("$transaction", uuid.toString());
169      sender.message(message);
170      return;
171    }
172
173    final boolean voided = receipt.get().voidTransaction();
174    if(!voided) {
175      final MessageData message = new MessageData("Messages.Transaction.Unable");
176      message.addReplacement("$transaction", uuid.toString());
177      sender.message(message);
178      return;
179    }
180    final MessageData message = new MessageData("Messages.Transaction.Voided");
181    message.addReplacement("$transaction", uuid.toString());
182    sender.message(message);
183  }
184}
